name: TopPoll
0:
”Alexa, Open Top Poll”
”Alexa, Start Top Poll”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: top poll
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Choose to have an opinion! 
Top Poll is the easiest, fastest, and most convenient way to voice your opinion on Government, Sports, Social, Environmental matters and more. 
Be a part of the populist drive that matters! Agree or disagree with government actions, vote for your favorite sports team, review a product by giving your likes and dislikes. Whatever your opinion, there is no easier way than voicing it from the convenience of Alexa. 

Just say "Alexa, open Top Poll" to voice your valuable opinion and feedback on regional and global matters.
